item.title: U.S. Argues Meta Built a Social Media Monopoly
item.description: The tech giant went to court on Monday in an antitrust trial focused on its acquisitions of Instagram and WhatsApp. The case could reshape its busines...

item.title: What We Know About the Arson Attack on Gov. Josh Shapiro’s House in Pennsylvania
item.description: The governor was forced to evacuate the residence with his family. The authorities have charged a man with attempted murder, arson and terrorism.

item.title: Trump Calls Russia’s Strike on Sumy a ‘Mistake’
item.description: At least 34 people were killed in the attack on Sumy, which came as Ukraine’s leader urged President Trump to come witness the realities of war firsth...

item.title: Blue Origin Flight Takes 6 Women, Including Gayle King and Katy Perry, to Space
item.description: The women made a 10-minute trip on Blue Origin’s New Shepard rocket, as the first all-female space crew in more than 60 years.

item.title: This Kidney Was Frozen for 10 Days. Could Surgeons Transplant It?
item.description: Scientists developed a way to freeze a large mammal’s kidney, which could ease organ shortages in the future. First, they had to see if their method w...
